description: First contact with mobile using Kony, a tool with the intention of creating cross-platform apps. One of the first certified developers in Brazil. Projects for Honda/SP (vehicle manufacturer), Tribanco/MG (retail bank for companies) and for Itaú/SP (largest bank in Latin America)
We turned off Kony apps at Itaú and started using native apps, my journey as an Android developer begins. First deliveries in mobile banking PJ (as an outsourced)
Beginning of a long cycle with the bank Santander/SP (smartphone/tablet), I deliver some demands in the old version of the app and a few months later we launched a new app just for smartphones

I am part of an antenna maintenance project at Nokia/Dallas-US, with 3 trips to implement the project on-site. Back to Santander after 6 months and I am part of the dynamic transaction authentication token implementation team
Project with a financial company Credsystem/SP (payment of bills with credit card). And projects with Safra/SP and Alfa/SP banks, both mobile banking versions
At this point, I no longer work directly with projects and start working as a sales and support engineer as an Android specialist
I return to work as an Android engineer at Itaú/SP (mobile banking PJ) now as an employee
Starts my acting cycle as Tech Lead, supporting mobile and web development squads
Still acting as Tech Lead at Itaú
